title: raftstore::store::fsm::batch::tests::test_batch fails unexpectedly
body: As stated in issue title. I've seen this one fail many times. No further info.

**NEVERMIND, it still fails with -j1 sometimes** //looks like it doesn't fail with `make -j1 test`:
`test raftstore::store::fsm::batch::tests::test_batch ... ok`
so, is it some kind of race thing? or due to parallelism, the router.send doesn't get a chance to finish sending before `system.shutdown()` is reached? (I can't pretend to understand, this is my first time here)

`--test-threads=1` seems to "solve" the issue, at the cost of time(which is significant)

<details>

```diff
diff --git a/Makefile b/Makefile
index 25da2e99..4f665d81 100644
--- a/Makefile
+++ b/Makefile
@@ -180,11 +180,11 @@ test:
 	export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="${DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH}:${LOCAL_DIR}/lib" && \
 	export LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG && \
 	export RUST_BACKTRACE=1 && \
-	cargo test --no-default-features --features "${ENABLE_FEATURES}" --all ${EXTRA_CARGO_ARGS} -- --nocapture && \
-	cargo test --no-default-features --features "${ENABLE_FEATURES}" --all --bench misc ${EXTRA_CARGO_ARGS} -- --nocapture  && \
+	cargo test --no-default-features --features "${ENABLE_FEATURES}" --all ${EXTRA_CARGO_ARGS} -- --nocapture --test-threads=1 && \
+	cargo test --no-default-features --features "${ENABLE_FEATURES}" --all --bench misc ${EXTRA_CARGO_ARGS} -- --nocapture --test-threads=1 && \
 	if [[ "`uname`" == "Linux" ]]; then \
 		export MALLOC_CONF=prof:true,prof_active:false && \
-		cargo test --no-default-features --features "${ENABLE_FEATURES},mem-profiling" ${EXTRA_CARGO_ARGS} --bin tikv-server -- --nocapture --ignored; \
+		cargo test --no-default-features --features "${ENABLE_FEATURES},mem-profiling" ${EXTRA_CARGO_ARGS} --bin tikv-server -- --nocapture --ignored --test-threads=1; \
 	fi
 	bash scripts/check-bins-for-jemalloc.sh
 ```

</details>

I wonder if there's a way (to tell `cargo` ?) to, at the end of the tests, automatically re-run failed tests with `--test-threads=1`...
